thread.title: RPT-Tokyo April core CPI rises 0.6 pct yr/yr

author: admin
title: RPT-Tokyo April core CPI rises 0.6 pct yr/yr
text: Home / NEWS / RPT-Tokyo April core CPI rises 0.6 pct yr/yr RPT-Tokyo April core CPI rises 0.6 pct yr/yr 2 hours ago NEWS , tokyo (Attaches to additional alerts) TOKYO, April 27 (Reuters) - Core consumer prices in Tokyo rose 0.6 percent in April from a year earlier, government data showed on Friday. The core consumer price index for Japanâ€™s capital, which includes oil products but excludes fresh food prices, compared with economists' median estimate for a 0.8 percent annual rise. (For queries, contact Stanley White at: stanley.white@thomsonreuters.com; +81 3 6441 1984) (Reuters Messaging: stanley.white.reuters.com@reuters.net)
